div.p: SIPHONANTHUS, in botany ; a genus of plants belonging to the claſs of tetrandia and order of mοnοgynia. The corolla is monopetalous, funnel-ſhaped ; the tube is very narrow, and much longer than the calyx. There are four berries, each containing one ſeed. There is only one ſpecies, the indica.
